name: Basic Package
description: Coverage of the birthday event for up to 2 hours

name: Standard Package
description: Extended coverage of the birthday event for up to 4 hours

name: Premium Package
description: Full-day coverage of the birthday event with additional candid shots

name: Deluxe Package
description: Extended coverage, high-resolution images, and a custom photo album

name: Ultimate Package
description: Full-day coverage, multiple photographers, high-quality prints, and a cinematic slideshow
